overview: Dear Father is an experimental project which is divided to 3 parts.  "Hello, have you eaten" is a collection of voicemails from a father calling his son to asked has he eaten and also their daily conversation of a father and son before the father passed away."Letters Never Sent" is a voice message from the son who he have never able to express his feelings to his late father who had passed away."Memory" is the final part where all the moments that we have would slowly fade away when time passes.
title: Dear Father
